guide.introduction:
Watch the video on CRAFT!

Here's a fun and simple project to make: a cover for your tissue box. The only thing you need to do is make three knots; basically just tie a handkerchief around the box. And it looks great!

Optionally, you can add buttons, pins, or other extra decorations for even more pizazz!
